short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Novus is an awesome New Tab interface that enhances bookmark management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- A beautiful new background image every day
- Location based date and weather
- Gmail notifications for unread e-mails
- Edit or remove bookmarks, in sync across all platforms

Coming Soon:
- Manage bookmark folders
- Change between grid and tree layout of bookmarks

Novus is a work in progress. Rate it and add your comments.
Share your ideas on how to improve it!
